seo.title: Information website about the coronavirus in Bulgaria
seo.description: Up-to-date information and charts for the spread of coronavirus in Bulgaria

charts.new_cases_today: {{count}} new cases have been announced today.
charts.new_cases_today_0: No new cases have been announced today.
charts.new_cases_today_1: A single new case has been announced today.
charts.diff_cases: The number of new cases is {{count}} {{diffType}} than yesterday.
charts.diff_cases_0: The number of new cases is the same as yesterday.
